blog.title: give me my portrait
blog.description: the world is changed because you are made of ivory and gold

summary: The best part about Larry, the thing that I forget sometimes is that it really happened. All those secret touches and fond...
body:
The best part about Larry, the thing that I forget sometimes is that it really happened. All those secret touches and fond smiles, all those little moments that we recreate in fanfictions? That ain’t fanfiction, or a story… it all really happened. All that actually happened. They really were two boys who fell in love and grew up in front of our eyes. I know we’ve all witnessed some wild shit. Rbb and sbb and blue green and Wellington and Leeds and babygate and that rubrics cube with the L & T and the 28 Gucci suits and all those tattoos and chickenstuffedwithmozzarellawrappedinparmaham and that 7 minute footage and…. I could go on and on…. but despite all that, I think the wildest thing is the fact that it all really happened. They really did fall in love. Larry is real. I know we all know that, but for some reason, it hit me real hard right now.

TL;DR: Larry is real.

summary: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 54 Chicago
title: Sidekick of a Superstar - Chapter 54 Chicago
body:
This is my new favourite chapter. Tried to make it fluff and gentleman Harry is present :)

Word count: 1.8k

Lookbook

Chicago look

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

You were on a three hour car trip to Chicago in the morning. You went with the minivan in the company of Harry, Jeff, Glenne, Mitch, Sarah, Louis and Lottie. You were in the back with Lottie, Harry drove and Louis sat in front of you to be close to Lottie.

When you entered Chicago you haven’t noticed anything unusual, but you heard Jeff talking to Harry about some other direction. You didn’t bother asking about it. You arrived in the city centre and Harry drove into a big underground parking lot. When Harry stopped he finally informed everyone about what’s happening.

“So, we’ll have two days off and I thought you’d like to relax some. Some others are here already. I booked you rooms and treatments in the spa. It’s a gift from me to you to thank everyone for what you’re doing for me every day. Everyone was excited and happy except you. They were all paired. Mitch and Sarah, Jeff and Glenne, Louis and Lottie, Harry and you. But you weren’t ready to be in the same room with him for two days and he should’ve known that. You got frustrated and hoped it’s gonna be over very soon. But you didn’t want to ruin others’ happiness. When you all went in and Harry checked everyone in, he guided everyone to their rooms. You were the last one.

“This is your room,” he said and handed you the key. You took it and he started walking away. So he did not want to force you to spend time with him. How could you think that? He was a gentleman even though you knew he wanted it. He only walked to the next door. You were still standing there with the key in one hand and with your suitcase in the other. He looked back and smiled before he entered his room. You thought the best would be to actually relax now you’ve got this as a gift. You had an hour long massage and then you tried to find a spot near the pool that is not too crowded, but you saw the others coming down all together so you decided to sneak out to be alone. Lottie texted you.

“Everything alright? Haven’t seen you since we arrived. Or r u with H? ;)”

“No, I’m not, I just want to relax alone. See you tomorrow L, have fun!”

You put your phone down and called room service. You ordered yourself lunch. You enjoyed the food, the silence and being alone. Tour is hectic sometimes, you’re always in noise or loud surroundings but this silence was calming. It was so silent that you heard something. Someone. Harry.

You had no idea where the voice is coming from until you realized that he’s next door. It was a luxury hotel and it was weird noises were so easily heard through the wall. You stood up and started examining the wall between you two. You put your ear on it and you were sure now that Harry is singing in the other room. You touched the wall and you jumped when the wall moved. It got wide open and you realized that your two rooms could be opened together. But there wasn’t a usual door, there was a wall-like door.

When it opened you and Harry looked at each other.

“Oh, sorry, I didn’t realize it was a door,” you said awkwardly.

“No, sorry for not telling you they can be opened together. I thought it’s locked. It was the last two rooms besides the king suite, but I thought you wouldn’t want to stay with me for the night.”

“Okay. It’s fine, I’ll close this and let you sing,” you said. You now saw the door opener and with the same move, the wall/door closed. Later that day when the pool area has started to get empty you went down to swim. Your mind was still in sync with Harry’s. He came down ten minutes later, only three or four people were still in the pool area. Everyone has gone to the restaurant to have dinner by now. He nodded from afar, you smiled back. When the pool has closed you went back together to your rooms.

“I want to invite you for dinner to my room,” he said and you looked up at him. “As a friend. Just a friendly dinner. We could talk about work.”

“Sure. That’s great. In an hour, is that fine?” you asked.

“Yes, that’s great!” he smiled.

You were actually glad you both took a step forward. You had to learn to be friends again. You didn’t know what to wear, elegant or casual so you tried to be somewhere in the middle. You put on pink high-waisted velvet jeans with black velvet pussy-bow blouse. You knocked before opening the door. Harry was ready. He wore black skinny jeans with a lousy colorful Gucci shirt.

“You look beautiful,” he said.

“Thank you! You look great!”

“I already ordered some fine wine. Can I pour?”

“Please,” you said. He poured wine for both of you and then you went through the menu to order. While you waited, you sat outside in the dark on the balcony with your wines.

“Mum said she called you, but you haven’t called her back,” he started a conversation.

“Oh, dammit, I forgot. I’ll call her tomorrow.”

“It’s okay. She knows you’re busy and just wanted to make sure you’re doing okay.”

“It’s very nice from her. I think she loves me more than my own mother. She hasn’t called me since they were on the concert back home,” you sighed.

“I’m sorry.”

“Don’t be, it’s not your fault,” you sipped from your glass. “It’s really nice that you gave us this gift. I had a massage before lunch. It was very much needed.”

“It’s my pleasure then. You all deserve it. You work hard for the success that is seemingly just mine, but it’s our success. I can’t thank the crew and my friends enough for what they, I mean what you do.”

“Believe me, you are the kind of boss that people are happy to work for,” you smiled.

“I heard you and Kacey are getting along,”Harry said.

“Yes, we head a heartfelt conversation about how much of an idiot I am,” you laughed. Harry laughed too.

“You’re not, you just…,”

“I judged too fast.”

“I mean everyone knew Ruston, except you.”

“Don’t judge me, Lottie said it’s because..,” you stopped.

“Because what?”

“Lottie said it’s because I was too high up in your arse to notice anything else,” you blurted out.

“Was she right?”

“I guess. My work is to know everything that’s going on about you, and you’re bloody famous so I have a lot of work.”

“Fair enough.” You heard the knock and Harry let the waiter in. You started having dinner and you continued the conversation. After you finished at around 10pm you said goodbye and went back to your room. You were happy that you could have a normal conversation and felt really good.

It was already about 3am when you woke up sweating and breathing heavily. You were fighting very hard in your dream. You were fighting with Mike and killed him, because he killed Harry. Just before you woke up, you weep over Harry’s dead body. You knew it was just a dream but it was so damn realistic, you needed to be sure Harry is still alive. You got out of bed and put the robe on. You tried to quietly open the door between yours and Harry’s room. You sneaked in and saw him sleeping there like a baby. He made those little noises. You started crying by the sight and the memory of what you saw in the dream. You gently caressed his hair to wake him up. He slowly opened his eyes but got up very quickly when he saw you sobbing by his bed.

“What happened? Love, tell me! Are you okay?” he asked worriedly. You nodded and he kissed your forehead and pulled you close to his chest.

“I just… uh.. It’s stupid. I’m so sorry. I didn’t want to…”

“What?”

“I just had a bad dream. You died in my arms and everything was covered in blood. Your blood.”

“Oh, darling. Come ‘ere!” he pulled you in fully and cradled you for a few minutes.

“Harry, please don’t misunderstand me, but can I stay for the rest of the night?”

“Of course,” he said and made space for you on the bed. You took the robe off and turned to face him, he pulled you close and caressed your back until you fell asleep.

The next thing you remember is waking up in Harry’s room, but he’s not there. You got out of bed and found a note on the table. “I went to the gym and for breakfast, you can stay as long as you want :)”

You went back to your room and dressed up. You ordered breakfast to your room and called Lottie to visit you. She arrived a few minutes later.

“Hey! I brought you a smoothie, y/n,” she said as she balanced hers and your cup in her hands.

“Thank you!” she sat down and you saw that she’s a bit weird. “What’s that, Lottie? I can see something’s wrong. Is it Louis?”

“No, it’s… ugh… I didn’t want to tell it, but you know I can’t keep it inside. I don’t want to spread rumours but I saw this with my own eyes.”

“What?” you frowned.

“I met Harry in the hallway this morning by his door. And he said he goes to the gym, but I had a look into his room… and I saw the bed… and there was a … a woman was in his bed. y/n I’m so sorry to tell you this,” Lottie was really sad but you started laughing and that made her confused. “Aren’t you upset that he spent the night with another girl?”

“I would be, but I was in his bed. You saw me,” Lottie’s eyes went wide.

“What? You already back together?”

“No, and I only got there in the am. I had a terrible dream about Harry dying and I really needed comfort. So I went there and fell asleep in his arms.”

“That sounds pretty good too, except the death part,” she said.

“Yeah,” you chuckled.

This day was filled with massages and special treatments. You didn’t talk about the night with Harry. You only met at lunch and at dinner because you had them all together. But it was nice that you could hang out with each other and others and actually enjoy it. The next day everyone moved into another hotel and went to the venue because it was concert night again. You had lots of work to do because you haven’t done anything in two days. 

So the day was a bit chaotic but the concert was fun as always. Harry was happy and jumpy, you could see that. And you knew it’s partly because of you, because Harry felt the same as you. He exposed how you and him call Derrick “Fudgesickle”. Well, he didn’t say it’s the two of you saying that, but you knew.

Just in a few days you enjoyed being around Harry again and you felt that things are going good. But you still needed some time to figure out the rest. Management was still a pain in the arse and you were thinking about waiting until the tour ends to get back together with Harry.

“Was she right?”

“I guess. My work is to know everything that’s going on about you, and you’re bloody famous so I have a lot of work.”

“Fair enough.” You heard the knock and Harry let the waiter in. You started having dinner and you continued the conversation. After you finished at around 10pm you said goodbye and went back to your room. You were happy that you could have a normal conversation and felt really good.

It was already about 3am when you woke up sweating and breathing heavily. You were fighting very hard in your dream. You were fighting with Mike and killed him, because he killed Harry. Just before you woke up, you weep over Harry’s dead body. You knew it was just a dream but it was so damn realistic, you needed to be sure Harry is still alive. You got out of bed and put the robe on. You tried to quietly open the door between yours and Harry’s room. You sneaked in and saw him sleeping there like a baby. He made those little noises. You started crying by the sight and the memory of what you saw in the dream. You gently caressed his hair to wake him up. He slowly opened his eyes but got up very quickly when he saw you sobbing by his bed.

“What happened? Love, tell me! Are you okay?” he asked worriedly. You nodded and he kissed your forehead and pulled you close to his chest.

“I just… uh.. It’s stupid. I’m so sorry. I didn’t want to…”

“What?”

“I just had a bad dream. You died in my arms and everything was covered in blood. Your blood.”

“Oh, darling. Come ‘ere!” he pulled you in fully and cradled you for a few minutes.

“Harry, please don’t misunderstand me, but can I stay for the rest of the night?”

“Of course,” he said and made space for you on the bed. You took the robe off and turned to face him, he pulled you close and caressed your back until you fell asleep.

The next thing you remember is waking up in Harry’s room, but he’s not there. You got out of bed and found a note on the table. “I went to the gym and for breakfast, you can stay as long as you want :)”

You went back to your room and dressed up. You ordered breakfast to your room and called Lottie to visit you. She arrived a few minutes later.

“Hey! I brought you a smoothie, y/n,” she said as she balanced hers and your cup in her hands.

“Thank you!” she sat down and you saw that she’s a bit weird. “What’s that, Lottie? I can see something’s wrong. Is it Louis?”

“No, it’s… ugh… I didn’t want to tell it, but you know I can’t keep it inside. I don’t want to spread rumours but I saw this with my own eyes.”

“What?” you frowned.

“I met Harry in the hallway this morning by his door. And he said he goes to the gym, but I had a look into his room… and I saw the bed… and there was a … a woman was in his bed. y/n I’m so sorry to tell you this,” Lottie was really sad but you started laughing and that made her confused. “Aren’t you upset that he spent the night with another girl?”

“I would be, but I was in his bed. You saw me,” Lottie’s eyes went wide.

“What? You already back together?”

“No, and I only got there in the am. I had a terrible dream about Harry dying and I really needed comfort. So I went there and fell asleep in his arms.”

“That sounds pretty good too, except the death part,” she said.

“Yeah,” you chuckled.

This day was filled with massages and special treatments. You didn’t talk about the night with Harry. You only met at lunch and at dinner because you had them all together. But it was nice that you could hang out with each other and others and actually enjoy it. The next day everyone moved into another hotel and went to the venue because it was concert night again. You had lots of work to do because you haven’t done anything in two days. 

So the day was a bit chaotic but the concert was fun as always. Harry was happy and jumpy, you could see that. And you knew it’s partly because of you, because Harry felt the same as you. He exposed how you and him call Derrick “Fudgesickle”. Well, he didn’t say it’s the two of you saying that, but you knew.

Just in a few days you enjoyed being around Harry again and you felt that things are going good. But you still needed some time to figure out the rest. Management was still a pain in the arse and you were thinking about waiting until the tour ends to get back together with Harry.
trail.content:
This is my new favourite chapter. Tried to make it fluff and gentleman Harry is present :)

Word count: 1.8k

Lookbook

Chicago look

Series Masterpost

MAIN MASTERLIST

You were on a three hour car trip to Chicago in the morning. You went with the minivan in the company of Harry, Jeff, Glenne, Mitch, Sarah, Louis and Lottie. You were in the back with Lottie, Harry drove and Louis sat in front of you to be close to Lottie.

When you entered Chicago you haven’t noticed anything unusual, but you heard Jeff talking to Harry about some other direction. You didn’t bother asking about it. You arrived in the city centre and Harry drove into a big underground parking lot. When Harry stopped he finally informed everyone about what’s happening.

“So, we’ll have two days off and I thought you’d like to relax some. Some others are here already. I booked you rooms and treatments in the spa. It’s a gift from me to you to thank everyone for what you’re doing for me every day. Everyone was excited and happy except you. They were all paired. Mitch and Sarah, Jeff and Glenne, Louis and Lottie, Harry and you. But you weren’t ready to be in the same room with him for two days and he should’ve known that. You got frustrated and hoped it’s gonna be over very soon. But you didn’t want to ruin others’ happiness. When you all went in and Harry checked everyone in, he guided everyone to their rooms. You were the last one.

“This is your room,” he said and handed you the key. You took it and he started walking away. So he did not want to force you to spend time with him. How could you think that? He was a gentleman even though you knew he wanted it. He only walked to the next door. You were still standing there with the key in one hand and with your suitcase in the other. He looked back and smiled before he entered his room. You thought the best would be to actually relax now you’ve got this as a gift. You had an hour long massage and then you tried to find a spot near the pool that is not too crowded, but you saw the others coming down all together so you decided to sneak out to be alone. Lottie texted you.

“Everything alright? Haven’t seen you since we arrived. Or r u with H? ;)”

“No, I’m not, I just want to relax alone. See you tomorrow L, have fun!”

You put your phone down and called room service. You ordered yourself lunch. You enjoyed the food, the silence and being alone. Tour is hectic sometimes, you’re always in noise or loud surroundings but this silence was calming. It was so silent that you heard something. Someone. Harry.

You had no idea where the voice is coming from until you realized that he’s next door. It was a luxury hotel and it was weird noises were so easily heard through the wall. You stood up and started examining the wall between you two. You put your ear on it and you were sure now that Harry is singing in the other room. You touched the wall and you jumped when the wall moved. It got wide open and you realized that your two rooms could be opened together. But there wasn’t a usual door, there was a wall-like door.

When it opened you and Harry looked at each other.

“Oh, sorry, I didn’t realize it was a door,” you said awkwardly.

“No, sorry for not telling you they can be opened together. I thought it’s locked. It was the last two rooms besides the king suite, but I thought you wouldn’t want to stay with me for the night.”

“Okay. It’s fine, I’ll close this and let you sing,” you said. You now saw the door opener and with the same move, the wall/door closed. Later that day when the pool area has started to get empty you went down to swim. Your mind was still in sync with Harry’s. He came down ten minutes later, only three or four people were still in the pool area. Everyone has gone to the restaurant to have dinner by now. He nodded from afar, you smiled back. When the pool has closed you went back together to your rooms.

“I want to invite you for dinner to my room,” he said and you looked up at him. “As a friend. Just a friendly dinner. We could talk about work.”

“Sure. That’s great. In an hour, is that fine?” you asked.

“Yes, that’s great!” he smiled.

You were actually glad you both took a step forward. You had to learn to be friends again. You didn’t know what to wear, elegant or casual so you tried to be somewhere in the middle. You put on pink high-waisted velvet jeans with black velvet pussy-bow blouse. You knocked before opening the door. Harry was ready. He wore black skinny jeans with a lousy colorful Gucci shirt.

“You look beautiful,” he said.

“Thank you! You look great!”

“I already ordered some fine wine. Can I pour?”

“Please,” you said. He poured wine for both of you and then you went through the menu to order. While you waited, you sat outside in the dark on the balcony with your wines.

“Mum said she called you, but you haven’t called her back,” he started a conversation.

“Oh, dammit, I forgot. I’ll call her tomorrow.”

“It’s okay. She knows you’re busy and just wanted to make sure you’re doing okay.”

“It’s very nice from her. I think she loves me more than my own mother. She hasn’t called me since they were on the concert back home,” you sighed.

“I’m sorry.”

“Don’t be, it’s not your fault,” you sipped from your glass. “It’s really nice that you gave us this gift. I had a massage before lunch. It was very much needed.”

“It’s my pleasure then. You all deserve it. You work hard for the success that is seemingly just mine, but it’s our success. I can’t thank the crew and my friends enough for what they, I mean what you do.”

“Believe me, you are the kind of boss that people are happy to work for,” you smiled.

“I heard you and Kacey are getting along,”Harry said.

“Yes, we head a heartfelt conversation about how much of an idiot I am,” you laughed. Harry laughed too.

“You’re not, you just…,”

“I judged too fast.”

“I mean everyone knew Ruston, except you.”

“Don’t judge me, Lottie said it’s because..,” you stopped.

“Because what?”

“Lottie said it’s because I was too high up in your arse to notice anything else,” you blurted out.

“Was she right?”

“I guess. My work is to know everything that’s going on about you, and you’re bloody famous so I have a lot of work.”

blog.description: 23 but often grumbles like a 90 year old // oh so very English // I write about Harry, feedback is always appreciated, but be NICE or don’t bother // Requests are currently CLOSED // Masterlist Kiddies!

summary: Hey!! Could you do an imagine where Harry is older than Y/N and she starts seeing him dressing like this you know baggy pants...
question: Hey!! Could you do an imagine where Harry is older than Y/N and she starts seeing him dressing like this you know baggy pants and all and her friends tease her that she's dating an old man? and one day Y/N gets mad and says some hurtful things to H and gets really insecure and upset? Happy Ending! 😘😘😘 Please do this Katteee
answer:
Hiya babes! Thank you so so much for requesting something, I’m flattered!

Unfortunately I don’t think this is a request I could do much justice with ☹️ I’ve been mulling over it for a while and trying to come up with a solid story but I’m just not really connecting with it, I’m so sorry 😭

I also can’t bring myself to insult anything Harry wears other than those awful loafers because I’m a pathetic bitch 😂

I hope you see where I’m coming from and I hope it doesn’t stop you from reading my other works!

All my love,

Kate xoxo
